description: ** World Wide shipping......*International buyers we charge by the shipment not by the item that means 1 flat rate no matter how much you order..........Sublime Gifts Amazonite Gemstone meaning: This semi-opaque blue-green variety of feldspar is named after the Amazon River. Amazonite balances feminine and masculine energy. It promotes kindness and practicality. It is an excellent stone for artists and for men. Pale azure blue amazonite is know as thelucky "Hope Stone". It will be lucky for all your hopes and dreams. Amazonite is blue-green to pale green stone in the feldspar group. It comes mainly from United States and Australia. Healing properties of amazonite: Amazonite helps balance the emotions and gives physical stamina.
